wikipedia_page.main:
John Read le Brockton Tomlin (15 August 1864 – 24 December 1954) was a British malacologist. He was one of the founders of the Malacological Society of London and was president of the Conchological Society of Great Britain & Ireland on two separate occasions.Tomlin named more than a hundred taxa of gastropod molluscs, including:

The family Abyssochrysoidea Tomlin, 1927
The family Columbariidae Tomlin, 1928He also named some scaphopods and bivalves.
